mapper.sql: id, aseetsID, applicantID, holderID, status, startTime, endTime, remark
mapper.select: select a.* , (select ai.name from assets_info ai where ai.id = a.aseetsID) aseetName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.id = a.holderID) holder from aseets_req a where a.applicantID = #{applicantID,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by status, aseetName

select a.* , (select ai.name from assets_info ai where ai.id = a.aseetsID) aseetName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.id = a.applicantID) applicant from aseets_req a where a.holderID = #{holderID,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by status, aseetName
mapper.insert:
insert into aseets_req
id,
aseetsID,
applicantID,
holderID,
status,
startTime,
endTime,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{aseetsID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{applicantID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{holderID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
